00017 #include "MisrUnitConv.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 /* M_PI is not defined in math.h in Linux unless __USE_BSD is defined */
00020 /* and you can define it at the gcc command-line if -ansi is set */
00021 #ifndef __USE_BSD
00022 # define __USE_BSD
00023 #endif
00024 #include <math.h>
00025 
00038 MTKt_status MtkDegMinSecToRad(
00039   int deg,    
00040   int min,    
00041   double sec, 
00042   double *rad  )
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Returen status of this function */
00045   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00046   double dd;            /* Decimal degrees */
00047 
00048   if (rad == NULL)
00049     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00050 
00051   status = MtkDegMinSecToDd( deg, min, sec, &dd );
00052   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00053 
00054   *rad = dd * (M_PI / 180.0);
00055 
00056   return status;
00057 
00058 ERROR_HANDLE:
00059   return status_code;
00060 }
